 import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { UserService } from 'src/app/services/user.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-search', templateUrl: './search.component.html', styleUrls: ['./search.component.css'] }) export class SearchComponent { results: any[] = [] constructor( private userService : UserService){} ngOnInit(){ this.results = this.userService.sendSearchResults() console.log(this.results) } }
